overview:
Brian D. Baumgart Chief Strategy Officer, Adconion Direct

Quick Stats:

BA degree in Finance from Washington State University and studied International Business in London
Began his Internet media career in 1999 at L90, Inc., as VP, where he launched their 3rd party ad server, AdMonitor
Founder and Managing Partner at Pacific Media Project, LLC, an online advertising and direct marketing company from 2002-2004
VP Business Development, member of the executive management team for Fastclick (NASDAQ: FSTC), acquired by ValueClick in 2005

More…

Prior to joining Adconion in 2005, Brian served as the Vice President of Business Development, and a member of the executive management team, for Fastclick, Inc. where the they successfully took the company public on the NASDAQ in 2005 and subsequently sold to ValueClick, Inc. (NASDAQ: VCLK). Prior to that, Brian was a founder and Managing Partner at Pacific Media Project, LLC, an online advertising and direct marketing company. Brian began his Internet media career in 1999 at L90, Inc. (now Ask Jeeves Interactive, a division of IAC, Inc. NASDAQ: IACI), as a Vice President of the company. Brian earned his B.A. degree in Finance from Washington State University and studied International Business in London.
